website_summaries.verdict: The holy grail — a sheer blush with skin-improving ingredients. Comes in one universal shade that flatters most skin tones.
pros: Moisturizing and brightening, this liquid blush smooths and protects the skin while providing a youthful rosy flush
Easy to apply without streaking and blends well
The warm rosy pink looks natural and lasts all day
cons: The shade does not suit all complexions

customer_reviews.title: Ancient
customer_reviews.text: The product I received was so ancient the Egyptians may have used it on their mummies. The pigment has separated and no amount of shaking will mix it up properly. Having said that, I use it after semi-stirring it with the wand and can see, if new, this is a nice blusher. Sometimes though one cheek is rosy and the other is peachy since the colors didn't mix :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A.Top Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it Perricone MD No Blush Blush
customer_reviews.text: The color you see is not really the color when you open it up and look at it. It's a bit on the peachy side, color wise. It does not go on smooth at all-very blotchy. I know me-I won't send it back but please save your money and buy something else. Just bc it's expensive does not mean it's good.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed! Application takes a dab per cheek and blended ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading negative reviews re: application and size of bottle, I was a bit nervous ordering. BUT, I have used the no foundation foundation for several years and trusted the company. I am not disappointed! Application takes a dab per cheek and blended for natural looking results! I love it! Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great Blush for No-Makeup Look!
customer_reviews.text: Best I've ever used on my sensitive skin - no irritation whatsoever. After a minute or so, it settles down and looks completely natural and non-garish. I very rarely wear foundation, but it's great with or without.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McBrair

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired
customer_reviews.text: Supplier outer wrap best by date is almost TWO YEARS different than actual product package. (10-31-2021 vs expiration date of 8-19 on package).
customer_reviews.author: Dmf

customer_reviews.title: I'm too dry for powder and don't like the way it sits on top of my skin
customer_reviews.text: So natural looking and stays true all day. I'm too dry for powder and don't like the way it sits on top of my skin. This blush seems to be color from within, just as promised. I'll never look for another blush.
customer_reviews.author: miami grammie

customer_reviews.title: Looks like natural rosy cheeks
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend $30 on this product but I’m so glad I did. Apply with a beauty blender, looks so much more natural and appears better as opposed to a makeup brush! Lasted all day long and looked so natural!
customer_reviews.author: jim f.

customer_reviews.title: Great glow for your cheeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a recommendation but it took a few tries to really get the look I was going for. It stays on well and gives you a bit of a glow. If you want something more vibrant, I would probably not get this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Still testing.
customer_reviews.text: Used with MD No Highlighter Highlighter. The products are a little flat/dull. By that i mean very fine wrinkles show slightly. I am comparing this to Cindy Joseph Highlighter and Cheek Color products. Not sure how long this small bottle will last.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Donegan

customer_reviews.title: Little expensive for quality
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, for every day casual makeup it’s just fine. Feels like nothing is on your skin which is a plus, didn’t last as long as other liquid tinted blushes I have used.
customer_reviews.author: caity

customer_reviews.title: love it and gives you just the right amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product if you are going for the natural look! love it and gives you just the right amount of blush to look fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No Blush Blush does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, adds subtle color and brings out facial bone structure so well. No skin irritation, does fade in about 3-4 hours. That said, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: finyin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this and every Perricone product I have tried. Don’t need to use a lot and stays on All day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blush with Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: The best part about this product is the fact that it contains a sunscreen, in addition to the regular sunscreen I use, providing additional protection for the cheek areas where I tend to get brown spots. To my knowledge, this is the only liquid blush on the market that can do that.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Koss

customer_reviews.title: Its true- no blush blush
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this product and I Love it. I have used many equally expensive brands of powdered blush for years and by 10AM you can't tell I even put it on. This lasts all day and it is perfect coloring for my lighter skin tone. I'm very happy but now I feel guilty about tossing the old stuff .. so I guess I have to use that up when I only need to look good for a couple of hours.!!
customer_reviews.author: Ndr

customer_reviews.title: Great blush
customer_reviews.text: Great blush, it is so light and a very nice color! I love this new product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning results with only a few dabs of color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blush. Do not overuse- only a few dabs are required for realistic and beautiful color. I dot with the wand, add a tiny bit of Photo Finish Cream, blend, the look is absolutely natural and stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Give just a hint of color. Great for everyday, subtle yet provides a natural glow. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Mitropoulos

customer_reviews.title: very nice, versatile product for cheeks and lips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great (small) way to carry and use a blush/lip stain. I wish it came in a more coral color but I love it and the texture of it on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: LAK

customer_reviews.title: but I have used before and love the
customer_reviews.text: The one I received seemed used and empty, but I have used before and love the product
customer_reviews.author: Philip Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft blush.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to get excited about but does the job as a light, natural looking blush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy!
customer_reviews.text: It's truly a great blush and you don't have to use a lot. It's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks
customer_reviews.text: Very natural! I am light skinned and it looks very nice. Plus the space is starting to be a must in my life
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed 11
customer_reviews.text: People said it was very natural looking and I thought it looked more orange than I would have liked. It also did not stay on for as long as I would have expected an expensive blush to do. Generally I was disappointed and will continue my search for a long lasting natural looking cream or liquid blush.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Werle

customer_reviews.title: no staying power
customer_reviews.text: this has ZERO staying power. I've tried it with foundation, without foundation, and either way it just does not last more than an hour. My skin is fair coloured and I'm middle aged.
customer_reviews.author: SheThinks

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pale skin. Easy to apply. I used this blush daily. Lasted almost 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It is very natural
customer_reviews.text: Blush, it does go on easily and gives a natural color to cheekbones. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends beautifully, gives a glow to the skin
customer_reviews.text: This blush gives me a very natural look. Blends beautifully , gives a glow to the skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Really bad off amazon do not buy this product here the quality wasn’t the same got stuck with it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney shaddow -saunders

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It goes on smoothe and has a natural feel and look. Will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Barta

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using No Blush Blush for several years. Natural looking and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The color is not that great. I would not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This product is way overpriced for what you get. The color is not that great. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pink color and stays on pretty well throughout the day. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The blush is actually easy to apply and the color is perfect for me. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: alixer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to apply, pretty, just a touch of color...
customer_reviews.author: Susan N. Kinne

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown!
customer_reviews.text: No different from other liquid blushes. Hard to smooth out on cheeks as it dries instantly. I can think of other blushes that are much easier to apply and, i might add, less expensive. Speaking as a blush fanatic, this one was a real letdown. My complection is fair and I have very dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. A little goes a long way and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. A little goes a long way and it lasts all day. A little pricey but well worth it. I highly recommend this product. The bottle is pink but when you put it on, it changes to your own natural color. All you need is 2 TO 3 droppes on each cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the subtle look on my check. Easy to apply and use. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat😺

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Orange!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it looks like a rosey-dark-pink color. IT'S NOT. It is crazy orange. I hate, hate, hate the color. Wish I'd bought it at Sephora, because then I could return the opened product. Really sad, because I wanted to love this. Heed my warning: If you have cool-toned skin, this product is NOT for you. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Liquid it light
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Liquid it light. Looks as if you just got done working out and have a light flush to your cheeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kumodiesel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bottle of blush. It is the best one I have ever had. A very natural color, blends awesome and it will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty when it goes on but doesn't last even half the day. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Perricone no blusher
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Very natural color! Goes on so smooth. Quick delivery! Good service. Would purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen garza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Creamy and blends so well. True color seen in the opaque bottle. Easy to carry and use on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Faded immediately no matter how much applied or how often.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this product. It’s too watery & disappears within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: mic

customer_reviews.title: The product is a little more intense in color than ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little more intense in color than I wanted. I thought I'd ordered a previous Perricone product that was a pink shade that when applied had an almost luminous/slight pearlized effect - that was what I thought I was purchasing. I probably won't be re-purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: georgia lynn

customer_reviews.title: Seems dried out (been around too long?)
customer_reviews.text: I love Dr Perricone face cosmetics as they cover nicely and look very natural. The blush, what I can bring up from the bottle, spreads smoothly and looks very natural, but the applicator is almost dry each time I shake and remove it from the bottle. It takes very vigorous shaking to mix what is in the bottle! Too bad because the eventual finished result is flattering.
customer_reviews.author: delraybuzz

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking, gentle on sensitive skin, and provides some extra sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: This blush goes on smoothly over my normal daily moisturizer or over sunscreen, and I like the idea that I'm getting some additional UV protection. It produces a very natural looking blush if you don't use too much. You'll learn how much is enough. And, despite what some other reviewers have said, it doesn't feel like it's burning or drying my very sensitive older skin. While it stays on nicely all day, it washes off easily at night, and it doesn't permanently stain my cheeks. I'm thrilled that I took a chance on it and it's definitely my new go-to! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: 4-Chin Fancier

customer_reviews.title: it's a real look
customer_reviews.text: It is very natural. If you are looking for a professional and polished look, then this is not for you. If you are looking for a real and natural look, then this is just the product. It took a few applications to see which was right for me in terms of the right blush (apple cheeks, etc.) but I finally got the look I wanted. Like most of Perricone's products, it is a no make up look.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lundy

customer_reviews.title: At Age 56.  No more dull skin.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and quality you would expect. Since I have a pink under stone to my skin, this is a perfect tone for me. I would return any Perricone Blush that turns orange! Note: Due to the long lasting use of this blush, it is no longer as smooth. Now it makes a great lipstain. I am adding an extra star for this added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I love this stuff! I was only wearing a highlighter, rather than a blush, but saw a write up on 'No Blush Blush' in a recent magazine and decided to try it. It is amazing! I love that there is just the one color, no worries about which to choose. It looks great on my skin--just enough color, just enough highlighting. I feel like my skin glows when I wear it :) And since I don't typically wear a lot of makeup, this is nice...just enough that it looks good, but not overdone. Perfect! Goes on easily and smoothly, too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product so much I bought it for my 4 sisters and my best friend!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sisters and friend because they kept complimenting me about how natural and glowing my cheeks looked. It's easy to apply, stays on all day and really looks like a natural sun kissed glow. The texture is almost like a foundation so it goes on smoothly unlike some stains I've tried. The one color seems to work for all different skin tones. My original little bottle has lasted for over a year. I ordered my second one but still haven't had to open it.
customer_reviews.author: febyolla shen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I am a makeup idiot and I can use this. It is subtle, foolproof, beautiful shade. I light skin tone with redness in my face. My only complaint is that with the amount I need to use, this bottle will last three years and I will probably have to throw it out well before finishing it- which is a shame for the price paid for it. Other than that, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikal

customer_reviews.title: Like nature, but better!
customer_reviews.text: I love the natural peachy-pink glow. It is pretty and youthful. The texture is very light and easy to blend. You can layer on more for intensity, if needed. Seems to last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Th3sa Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product, just not going to buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok for me. Not sure what I was expecting. It does not last all day, that is for sure. It's very dark when you first put it on and then gradually fades. Not a bad product, just not going to buy this again. Didn't wow me.
customer_reviews.author: pinotgirl

customer_reviews.title: Staying power, natural
customer_reviews.text: Lasts all day, beautiful natural color. I have very light Latin skin. Look best in pinks, greys, yellows, maroon, aqua blue clothing, if that helps any.
customer_reviews.author: Love horses

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for almost a year now and I love it. It makes me glow and no need ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for almost a year now and I love it. It makes me glow and no need to wear anything under it. Love love love it. I wish the lipstick is the same. I’m also wondering if it’s vegan?
customer_reviews.author: Zooza Akbar

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this pink color looks great on my olive skin. I've been using this blush for a couple of years. I love it. Some metallic blushes clog my pores. This one doesn't. That's why I use it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Emch

customer_reviews.title: I like this
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. I like how it has spf. My cream sticks from Nars do not. And I swear they enhanced my age spots and freckles. So I like the color and the fact it has spf.
customer_reviews.author: mark twain

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing blush! It has a buildable quality with SPF built in (bonus). It looks natural, like a youthful flush. I was using a pricy blush that was great but had a iridescence that made it look fake... this is much better for day to day wear!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting blush. Concentrated. Use very little.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blush. A few dots on each cheek, pat lightly and quickly to spread and blend. Great natural glow and lasts for hours. LOVE THIS BLUSH!
customer_reviews.author: B Perlik

customer_reviews.title: Natural and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for blush- looks natural and provides spf. I don’t like to wear a bunch of makeup- I have freckles- and this blush is just so natural looking and stays on!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail A. Fender

customer_reviews.title: Great natural sunkissed color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this liquid blush. Goes on smooth and has a natural glow look. Stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the color is just right, I am a fair to medium complexion auburn haired and freckled person and this color blends well. It does not fade easily and washes off with soap and water. I would recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks totally natural! It takes very little to make a nice cheek color. I put two dots on each cheek and blend outwards. Very nice color with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Looks really are deceiving!
customer_reviews.text: The color of the product in the picture looks totally different in person. In the picture, the color looks like a really rosy, nice pink color. The actual product was not that color. It's not a good color for my skintone (I'm honey brown/cinnamon). Gonna give it away.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingMe

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It will probably last me forever because I only use one dot on each cheek, I'm fair skinned. So definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: HE

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my 74 year old face
customer_reviews.text: Goes on very even and doesn’t look too red or peachy.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect find; I needed a blush that would not ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect find; I needed a blush that would not interfere with my sunscreen during the day, and it even enhances the sunscreen! It's such a great color that gives a very natural-looking flush, day or night. There are no glittery bits, either! A little goes a long way, so the product lasts quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but doesn't last on me
customer_reviews.text: When you first put it on you fall in love with how natural it is and it leaves such a lovely glow. But it doesn't last. As least not on me. Toooo bad. Perhaps I am not using it correctly. Will check into that.
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great blush! Gives a little rosy color but no too much. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but nice and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I do like this blush. It's natural looking and easy to apply. I have light olive toned skin with yellow undertones. I think this would look good on a variety of skin tones. As far as miracle skin benefits I have not noticed any. I am usually very allergic to new things but so far this has not irritated my skin. My only complaint is the price. It seems way too pricey for the tiny amount. I have found other blushes from Tarte that I love way more. Maybe this blush will last a long time which makes the price a bit more understandable. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: just enough color for a natural look
customer_reviews.text: Just enough color for me. It is a hair more peachy on me but I'm happy with the result. I use with No Foundation Foundation and I am medium skin tone. You can layer more on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: this blush wins out over every other blush in my drawer
customer_reviews.text: My Stila, Nars, and Tarte blushes are sad; they have not been used even once since this came in the mail a month ago. It is very liquid yet manages to feel grainy, but it smoothes right in and lasts all day. The bottle looks tiny, but it takes very little to get a nice flush.and, because I don't need to reapply midday, the miniature bottle is going to last a long time. Will absolutely repurchase. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: j.dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this before so I knew what to expect. It's very natural looking and lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: MankaC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the small amount needed to give a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Chanteuse

customer_reviews.title: Soft blush that works with your skin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, soft, long-lasting blush that never looks fake. I wear it dailu
customer_reviews.author: MarilynB

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: Not so nice if you have a yellowish skin undertone. The color is just off for me. It is a very odd dark rosy color. I'm guessing it would look good on fairly dark skin...
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It so easy to control the amount with this type of blush.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: love!!! just the right color on cheeks. very natural looking
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: I like this blush
customer_reviews.text: I like this blush. The color is natural looking and it stays on all day. The only thing I don't like is the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The trick is to put on the tiniest bit, then add if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Vande Vanter

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A little goes a long way and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A little goes a long way and there is none of the "creasing" that you get with powder.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Blends impeccably well
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have olive to dark skin and it blends in perfectly and looks very natural. It is my go-to blush for work and regular activities.
customer_reviews.author: Sandik

customer_reviews.title: No Blush Blush
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Easy to apply. Lasts all day. Looks very natural. You also use very little, so this should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: PaulDeb 7183

customer_reviews.title: FORGET ABOUT IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of my hard earned money. I should have known 'No Blush Blush' would mean just that--NADA, zilch, nothing!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsJ

customer_reviews.title: This the worst make up
customer_reviews.text: This the worst make up. It is difficult to apply and does nothing to improve your complexion. Even worse, the makeup is thick and feels like you are wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: 50's look
customer_reviews.text: Gard to blend. Very red, not a neutral. Reminded me of the color my mom wore in the 50's.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what this product was suppose to do. I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: pamela v williams

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Over priced. I returned it for a refund. There are much better products out there. Save your money. I bought the lipstick too. Just like lighting a match to my money. I will never order another Perricone product.
customer_reviews.author: Book fan

customer_reviews.title: Just a fresh healthy blush of colour
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream blush. It’s just the right color and so easy to apply. It never looks fake.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo912

product_meta.title: Perricone MD No Blush Blush, 0.3 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Perricone MD No Blush Blush

BRAND STORY
With groundbreaking discoveries comes pioneering treatments. Our holistic approach combines an anti-imflammatory diet with nutritional supplements and advanced skincare.
